summary: A beautiful but burnt out psychiatrist goes to the family's winter cottage for a weekend with her husband and sister, which is interrupted when a terrifying and unexpected guest arrives, a violent sex offender and patient of the doctor.
cast: Kate Greenhouse|Bruce McFee|Jeff Seymour|David Calderisi|Trevor Hayes|Gordon Currie|Kathryn Haggis|Iris Graham|Dov Tiefenbach|Aidan Devine
keywords: home invasion|psychopath|sex with sister's husband|cheating husband|rapist
title: Horas de horror
